Citizens School 2012 === Lesson 1 - What is HTML? Lesson 2 - Why is my site so ugly? Lesson 3 - Let's add some images! Lesson 4 - Links Lesson 5 - Embedding Videos Lesson 6 - Colors HTML Tags Reference --- ### \ **Description:** tag that tells the computer that this is an html file, minimal required tag to create a webpage **Usage:** ```html Hello! ``` --- ### \ **Description:** the head contains elements such at the title, the favicon, stylesheets, etc. remember, anything in the head will not show up in the content of the webpage **Usage:** ```html Webpage title ``` --- ### \ **Description:** you can think of the body as the meat of the webpage. you would place all your content here. **Usage:** ```html Webpage title This is the body! I would write my bold tags and underline tags and place my images here. ``` --- ### \ **Description:** bolds the text **Usage:** ```html Bold! ``` --- ### \ **Description:** italicizes the text **Usage:** ```html Italics! ``` --- ### \ **Description:** underlines the text **Usage:** ```html Underline! ``` --- ### \ **Description:** scrolls text from the right side of the screen to the left **Usage:** ```html Watch me move across the screen! ``` --- ### \ **Description:** the line break tag creates a new line **Usage:** ```html
``` **Example:** Without the \ tag, if you had the following code. ```html Hello.How are you? ``` It would look like this. **Hello.** *How are you?* With the break tag. ```html Hello.
How are you? ``` It would look like this **Hello.** *How are you?* --- ### \ **Description:** creates a horizontal line **Usage:** ```html
``` --- ### \ **Description:** the div tag divides or separates out content. you can think of using this to group things together. **Usage:** ```html
Name: John Favorite Color: Teal
Name: Sally Favorite Color: Magenta
``` --- ### \ **Description:** paragraph tag **Usage:** ```html

Centers Something
``` --- ### \ **Description:** image tag, used to display images onto the webpage **Usage:** ```html ``` --- ### \ **Description:** link tag, used to link other webpages **Usage:** ```html Click here to go to google! ``` --- ## Styles ### \Hi there!\ **Description:** styles the text and makes the font color green --- ### \The sky is blue!\ **Description:** styles the text and changes the font to Arial --- ### \
This text is highlighted!\ **Description:** styles the text and changes the background color of the text to yellow --- ### \ **Description:** displays an image, but resizes the image to a width of 100 pixels and a height of 120 pixels
